scenes.background: You, Monica, and Bob are discussing the celebration planning.
scenes.description: Bob sighs and says, 'Maybe we should just cancel the whole thing.'

options.text: Cancelling isn't the best idea. Let's find a compromise.
options.analysis: You showed good self-regulation and empathy by suggesting finding a compromise, but motivation was lower.

options.text: Cancelling might be too drastic. We can come up with a better plan.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern and proposed an alternative, showing good perception but empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: If we're really divided, cancelling might be the best option.
options.analysis: You showed willingness to adapt and consider another idea, showing good motivation but empathy and self-regulation were lower.
